objects.name: Analytic 0749
objects.description: Detects malicious archiving via system or third-party libraries (libz, libarchive) invoked by Python, Swift, or Objective-C binaries. Correlates unified logs of library loads with creation of compressed or encrypted archives (.zip, .gz, .bz2, .dmg).

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of Python, Swift, or other binaries invoking archiving libraries

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Loading of libz.dylib, libarchive.dylib by non-standard applications

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Creation of .zip, .gz, .dmg archives in /Users, /tmp, or application directories

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Applications allowed to load compression libraries (e.g., backup agents).
Flag archiving under privileged or system accounts as suspicious.
Targeted monitoring of sensitive file formats or compressed containers.
